tokenize.from sentence:
MULTI - EVIDENCE QUESTION ANSWERING ON WIKIHOP
We tokenize the data using Stanford CoreNLP .

fixed Glo Ve embeddings.from sentence: We use fixed Glo Ve embeddings as well as character ngram embeddings .

symbolic query relations.from sentence: We split symbolic query relations into words .

trained using.from sentence: All models are trained using ADAM .

state - of - the - art results.from sentence: The CFC achieves state - of - the - art results on both the masked and unmasked versions of WikiHop .

blind , held - out WikiHop test set.from sentence: In particular , on the blind , held - out WikiHop test set , the CFC achieves a new best accuracy of 70.6 % .

ON.from sentence: RERANKING EXTRACTIVE QUESTION ANSWERING ON TRIVIAQA

Our experimental results.from sentence: Our experimental results in show that reranking using the CFC provides consistent performance gains over only using the span extraction question answering model .

improves.from sentence: In particular , reranking using the CFC improves performance regardless of whether the candidate answer set obtained from the span extraction model contains correct answers .

has.from sentence: On the whole Trivia QA dev set , reranking using the CFC results in again of 3.1 % EM and 3.0 % F1 , which suggests that the CFC can be used to further refine the outputs produced by span extraction question answering models .
